Class Collectible

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
game.Collectible
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, EventListener
public class Collectible extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
Represents a collectible item that increases the player's score when collected.

      public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
